data: “AND this is the pillar that Rob Roy hid behind, the Sabbath day that he warned the young English gentleman in the kirk. It’s the very place itsel. Here was the pulpit—and the seats were a’ here, and this is the pillar that hid Rob Roy.”
browsing: culture/civilization/society|browsing: literature|browsing: fiction|category: historical novels|category: novels|category: british literature
